newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: NBNZ cuts NZ variable mortgage rate to 9.4 pct.
newsitem.headline: NBNZ cuts NZ variable mortgage rate to 9.4 pct.

text.p: The National Bank of New Zealand said on Wednesday it would cut its New Zealand variable home lending rate to 9.4 percent from 9.95 percent.
The move is effective for new business from May 5 and for existing business from May 30.
The bank also said it would cut its one-year fixed home loan rate to 9.25 percent from 9.5 percent, effective for new business from May 5.
